an3.150:1.1: “Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an3.150:1.3: Akusalena kayakammena, akusalena vacikammena, akusalena manokammena—
an3.150:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an3.150:2.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an3.150:2.3: Kusalena kayakammena, kusalena vacikammena, kusalena manokammena …pe….
